name: RainonPavement
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Pavement”
”Alexa ask Rain on Pavement to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on pavement
des:
Rain on Pavement features the sound of rain as it hits paved surfaces, such as sidewalks and streets. The resulting sound has a steady, rhythmic quality that can be comforting and help with concentration or simply serve as a peaceful background.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Pavement
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
